name: Mundo Sin Vida [Demo]
description:
You've arrived somewhere. You don't remember anything.

Who are you? Do you remember anything?

Mundo Sin Vida is the land of Lifeless people. Waiting to be reincarnated. 

Waiting for the Lost Hero... 

(This game is still a demo... please inform me about the bugs.)

Game Features :

  • 2 Endings (?)
  • Player Insert
  • Save Point on Each Town
  • Add/Remove Party
  • Sometimes funny narrator, but can be a sass ass.
  • Secret Rooms and Hidden Keys.
  • And Many more.. Because the dev is lazy lol.
  • Memes

The first demo is released on 17/08/2018

Mundo Sin Vida Instagram!! >> @msv
